root.name: Bumbledore
root.description: OverviewBumbledore is a puzzle game developed and published by Nimbly Games and released on many platforms.Bumbledore is, surprisingly, a wizard that accumulated a big horde of insects and wants to take over your home.The game is basically a tower defense game in which you have to stop the hordes of insects to enter your home by summoning fireballs, lightning and ice arrows to smash your enemies.PC System RequirementsOS: PC, Mac (Windows 7 / Vista / Vista64 / XP, OS X)Processor: 1.0 GhzMemory: 256 MBHard Disk Space: 100 MB of free spaceVideo: 64 MB VRAM
